source:
%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.mrw_lines_dim

SELECT
    T1.id AS MRWLinesID,
    T1.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T1.timesheet_date AS TimeSheetDate,
    T1.line_number AS LineNumber,
    T1.job_id AS JobID,
    T1.workstage_id AS WorkstageID,
    T1.workstage_name AS WorkstageName,
    T1.dated AS Dated,
    T1.hours AS Hours,
    T1.pdac_etl_date AS PDACETLDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    T1.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.id, "."), IFNULL(T1.inspector_id, "."), IFNULL(T1.line_number, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_lines T1;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.mrw_status_dim

SELECT
    T2.id AS MRWStatusID,
    T2.job_id AS JobID,
    T2.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T2.timesheet_date AS TimeSheetDate,
    T2.status_id AS StatusID,
    T2.status_name AS StatusName,
    T2.inspector_submit_date AS InspectorSubmitDate,
    T2.pdac_etl_date AS PDACETLDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    T2.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T2.id, "."), IFNULL(T2.job_id, "."), IFNULL(T2.inspector_id, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_status T2;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.mrw_submission_date_dim

SELECT
    T3.id AS MRWSubmissionDateID,
    T3.dated AS Dated,
    T3.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T3.job_id AS JobID,
    T3.status AS StatusID,
    T3.status_name AS StatusName,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    T3.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T3.id, "."), IFNULL(T3.job_id, "."), IFNULL(T3.inspector_id, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_submission_date T3;

%%sql

-- INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mrw_fact(
--     LegacyMRWID,
--     InspectorID,
--     MRWLinesID,
--     MRWDStatusID,
--     MRWSubmissionDateID,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo,
--     RowID,
--     IsActive
-- )

SELECT
    uuid() AS LegacyMRWID,
    T1.InspectorID AS InspectorID,
    T1.MRWLinesID AS MRWLinesID,
    T2.MRWStatusID AS MRWStatusID,
    T3.MRWSubmissionDateID AS MRWSubmissionDateID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.InspectorID, "."), IFNULL(T1.MRWLinesID, "."), IFNULL(T2.MRWStatusID, "."), IFNULL(T3.MRWSubmissionDateID, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.mrw_lines_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.mrw_status_dim T2 ON T1.InspectorID = T2.InspectorID
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.mrw_submission_date_dim T3 ON T1.InspectorID = T3.InspectorID;

-- Issue is with MRWSubmission being null...  have to recheck my 'join's
